topComments.author: Franklin Quito

Este lugar √© √≥timo para qualquer atividade de praia que voc√™ possa ter planejado e, se voc√™ quiser apenas dar um passeio, eles t√™m um sistema de cauda que o leva a uma jornada diferente. N√£o lotado para uma visita ao meio-dia de s√°bado. No entanto, voc√™ tem que caminhar cerca de 1/4 de milha do estacionamento at√© a praia, mas o parque estadual tem um "shuttle" na forma de um carrinho de golfe longo que transportar√° cerca de 6 pessoas. Ent√£o esteja preparado, mas com toda honestidade a caminhada √© √≥tima voc√™ n√£o vai se arrepender  (Original) This is a place I've never heard about.  Off the beaten path that most non Florida residents are not aware.  This place is great for any beach activities you might have planned and if you just want to take a walk then they have a tail system that takes you on a different journey.  I didn't personally walked any of the trails but it looked like fun.  We did visit the gift shop and that was great.  The best part was the beach.  Not Crowded for a Saturday midday visit.  However, you do have to walk about 1/4 mile from the parking lot to the beach but the state park does have a "shuttle" in the form of a long golf cart that will carry about 6 people.  So be prepared, but in all honesty the walk is great you won't regret it

A √°gua √© t√£o bonita. Azul e claro. Simplesmente incr√≠vel. O centro de natureza e loja de presentes √© um bom complemento. Esteja pronto para andar. Fa√ßa lanches e bastante √°gua. H√° banheiros na praia que foram limpos. O chuveiro tamb√©m estava funcionando. O cal√ßad√£o da praia √© uma boa caminhada, ent√£o esteja preparado. Tamb√©m h√° trilhas naturais, tanto para explorar  (Original) This place is absolutely beautiful!! I came here after doing some research for shelling and I wasn't disappointed! It was a workout. A caminhada at√© a praia estava ventando, mas absolutamente de tirar o f√¥lego! Voc√™ come√ßa a ver uma variedade de paisagens aqui. A vista da praia √© de morrer. Espl√™ndido. Vi minha primeira √°gua-viva e comprei conchas de lembran√ßa da praia. Chegamos tarde demais para verificar o centro de observa√ß√£o. Eles alugam caiaques e bicicletas tamb√©m. Se tiv√©ssemos tempo, poder√≠amos ter feito muito aqui, mas apenas fizemos uma visita r√°pida e ficamos muito impressionados.  (Original) What a place! You pay to enter the park, a small fee. Parking was easy to find. The walk to the beach was windy but absolutely breathtaking! You get to see a variety of landscapes here. The view at the beach is to die for. Stunning. topComments.author: Bill
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este parque merece 6 estrelas. Minha esposa e eu fomos ao MacArthur Beach Park h√° um ano, quando o parque estava aberto, mas a maioria das instala√ß√µes estava fechada para o Covid. Andamos a maior parte da trilha e alguns quil√¥metros at√© a praia. Havia um sinal de que cadeiras de rodas de praia n√£o est√£o dispon√≠veis no momento. Minha m√£e de 88 anos vem dizendo que quer ir √† praia e j√° faz anos. N√≥s a levamos a alguns parques onde ela pode sentar e ver a √°gua, mas as praias eram imposs√≠veis com seu andador.  Ao entrar no parque nesta viagem com minha esposa e minha m√£e, perguntei ao guarda florestal na cabine de entrada se cadeiras de rodas de praia estavam dispon√≠veis. O guarda disse que h√° um bonde que poderia levar todos n√≥s para o outro lado do cal√ßad√£o, onde poder√≠amos pegar a cadeira de rodas da praia. Uma vez que estacionamos, o bonde chegou e perguntou se est√°vamos no SUV azul e confirmamos que est√°vamos. O arqueiro da entrada chamou antes para avis√°-los que √≠amos com minha m√£e. O motorista nos disse para esperar enquanto ele virava o bonde. Entramos com o andador da minha m√£e guardado na parte de tr√°s do bonde. Ele foi extremamente amig√°vel e queria que minha m√£e aproveitasse o passeio pela √°gua no cal√ßad√£o. Do outro lado, um guarda florestal diferente estava esperando por n√≥s com a cadeira de rodas de praia.  Minha m√£e entrou na cadeira de rodas reclin√°vel de 3 rodas muito legal com pneus tipo bal√£o. Sentada no ch√£o com os p√©s na frente dela, comecei a empurr√°-la pela rampa at√© o outro lado, onde voc√™ pode ver o oceano. H√° um ponto onde a cerca de madeira maci√ßa √© abaixada para que voc√™ possa ver o oceano sentado nesta cadeira de rodas lowrider. Depois descemos a rampa at√© a praia. Atravessar a areia foi f√°cil. Os pneus do bal√£o n√£o afundaram na areia. Chegamos √† beira da mar√© alta, onde a praia desce abruptamente e estacionamos a cadeira de rodas ali. N√≥s tr√™s passamos os pr√≥ximos 90 minutos olhando para o oceano. Era um dia perfeito na Fl√≥rida. Cool (para a Fl√≥rida) c√©u azul brilhante sem uma nuvem e pequenas ondas perfeitamente moldadas rolando. A praia tinha algumas pessoas, mas eles estavam todos um pouco ao sul de n√≥s, ent√£o tivemos essa √°rea para n√≥s mesmos. Voc√™ n√£o poderia pedir uma experi√™ncia mais bonita.  Quando come√ßamos nosso passeio naquele dia, est√°vamos planejando ir a um parque diferente, onde poder√≠amos sentar em um banco do parque e ver o oceano, mas n√£o chegar perto dele. Minha esposa sugeriu que f√¥ssemos √† praia de MacArthur. A 20 minutos a mais de carro, mas pensei que poder√≠amos caminhar um pouco no cal√ßad√£o vendo a ba√≠a. .  No final, tornou-se um dia m√°gico para minha m√£e e para n√≥s. Nos sentimos VIPs. Todos pareciam empolgados em nos ajudar a fazer um √≥timo passeio. A disponibilidade e simpatia foi bem acima de tudo o que poder√≠amos esperar. Lamento n√£o ter recebido os nomes de todos que nos ajudaram a dar-lhes uma chamada bem merecida. Espero que eles vejam isso e entendam o quanto eles fizeram desta uma experi√™ncia incr√≠vel para levar minha m√£e para a praia que era seu desejo h√° anos.  (Original) This park deserves 6 Stars. My wife and I went to MacArthur Beach Park a year ago when the park was open but most facilities were closed for Covid. We walked most of the trail and a couple of miles up the beach. There was a sign that beach wheelchairs are not currently available. My 88 year old mother has been saying that she wants to go to the beach and it‚Äôs been years. We have taken her to a couple of parks where she can sit and see the water but beaches were impossible with her walker.  Upon entering the park on this trip with my wife and my mother, I asked the ranger at the entrance booth if beach wheelchairs were available. The ranger said there is a tram that could take all of us to the other side of the boardwalk where we could get the beach wheelchair. Once we parked the tram drove up and asked if we were in the blue SUV and we confirmed we were. The entrance Ranger called ahead to let them know we were going with my mother. The driver told us to wait as he turned the tram around. We got in with my mother‚Äôs walker stored on the back of the tram. He was extremely friendly and wanted my mother to enjoy the ride across the water on the boardwalk. On the other side a different ranger was waiting for us with the beach wheelchair.  My mother got into the really cool looking 3 wheel reclining wheelchair with balloon type tires. Sitting low to the ground with her feet in front of her, I started to push her up the ramp to the other side where you can see the ocean. There is a spot where the solid wood fence is lowered so you can view the ocean sitting in this lowrider wheelchair. Then we continued down the ramp to the beach. Pushing across the sand was easy. The balloon tires didn‚Äôt sink into the sand. We got to the edge of the high tide where the beach angles down steeply and parked the wheelchair there. The three of us spent the next 90 minutes looking at the ocean. It was a perfect Florida day. Cool (for Florida) bright blue sky without a cloud and small perfectly shaped waves rolling in. The beach had some people on it but they were all a little south of us so we had this area to ourselves. You could not ask for a more beautiful experience.  When we started our drive that day we were planning to go to a different park where we could sit on a park bench and see the ocean but not get near it. My wife suggested we go to MacArthur Beach. A 20 minute longer drive but thought we could walk out a little ways on the boardwalk seeing the bay. .  In the end it turned into a magical day for my mother and us. We felt like VIPs. Everyone seemed excited to help us make it a great outing. The helpfulness and friendliness was well above anything we could have expected. I regret not getting the names of everyone who helped us to give them a well deserved call out. I hope they see this and understand how much they made this an amazing experience to get my mother onto the beach which had been her desire for years.

topComments.author: Shena Hinshelwood
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Uma joia escondida do sul da Fl√≥rida. Este lugar est√° lindamente escondido na √°rea de West Palm. √â uma taxa de entrada de $ 5 por carro. Depois de entrar, voc√™ dirige pelo que parece ser uma floresta. O estacionamento fica a uma dist√¢ncia da pr√≥pria praia. Porque voc√™ tem que atravessar a ponte sobre o intercostal, mas assim que chegar ao outro lado, voc√™ ficar√° maravilhado! A praia √© imaculada. Areia branca e √°guas azuis. Eu localizei alguns caranguejos na areia que me lembraram das ilhas. E a vantagem deste local √© que ele √© isolado. Literalmente, um punhado de pessoas estava l√°. Em suma, se voc√™ est√° procurando um local pitoresco apenas para relaxar e n√£o est√° lotado de pessoas. Definitivamente √© isso.  (Original) A South Florida hidden gem. This place is beautifully tucked away in West Palm area. Its is a $5 entrance fee per car. Once you enter, your driving through what feels like a forest. The parking is a distance from the beach itself. Because you have to walk across bridge over the intercoastal but once you get to the other side you will be wowed! The beach is pristine. White sand and blue waters. I did spot a few crabs on the sand which reminded me of the islands. And the plus about this spot is it is secluded. Just literally a handful of people was there. All in all if you are looking for a scenic spot just to relax and is not crowded with people. This is definitely it.

Uma pessoa estava relutante e chateada por termos que caminhar at√© a praia. √â uma caminhada de 20 minutos pela guerra, mas quando chegamos √† praia, minha esposa adorou a √°gua verde cristalina e me convenceu a pular e, cara, nos divertimos  (Original) It was a hot human thing. topComments.author: Victoria
topComments.comment: Amazing gorgeous state park, God's creation is just beautiful! BUT If you enjoy kayaking, invest in your own to BRING WITH YOU so you can enjoy your experience to the fullest potential. I just cannot give 5 stars because the women I went through the kayak rental process with were very abrasive, aggressive, and extremely condescending. They stressed me the heck out after such a peaceful day over being late to return kayaks that we happily paid the late fee for after enjoying our beautiful day.  CONTEXT: The kayak is not equipt for bringing and protecting expensive technology such as a watch or phone that can tell time. If I brought my expensive phone just to tell time, it would have been destroyed by water damage. That's fine! Everyone's intention in that moment should be disconnecting with technology and connecting with nature and the ones you love. I ignored their attacking. Enjoy the nature and try to refrain from talking to anyone who works there. Majority do not like this job, it shows, and it just takes away from the experience

topComments.author: Sara Balliett
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo lugar para a fam√≠lia, mas venha preparado! √â uma experi√™ncia de dia inteiro. Este N√ÉO √© um local de viagem r√°pida √† praia. H√° um cal√ßad√£o muito longo sobre belas √°guas para chegar √† praia. N√£o h√° sombra nesta praia, mas a √°gua √© clara e linda. Pais, aqui est√° o que voc√™s v√£o querer saber. * Existem banheiros. * H√° um chuveiro perto do final do cal√ßad√£o, mas apenas um chuveiro funciona bem, ent√£o voc√™ pode ter que esperar. O p√© baixo n√£o. * H√° uma loja de presentes, mas voc√™ pode ignorar e os pequenos n√£o notar√£o. Eles t√™m protetor solar, mas voc√™ vai querer trazer o seu pr√≥prio protetor solar √† prova d'√°gua. √â uma longa dist√¢ncia da praia. * A caminhada do carro at√© a praia ser√° um pouco menos de um quil√¥metro do in√≠cio at√© a cadeira. Traga uma carro√ßa para o seu equipamento/filhos e verifique tr√™s vezes se n√£o deixa nada no carro porque n√£o vai querer voltar. √â um belo passeio e faz parte da experi√™ncia. *H√° um parque infantil perto da √°rea de estacionamento. *A taxa de entrada √© de apenas 5 por carro. Nada mal.  *Para todos aqueles que n√£o moram perto da √°gua e podem precisar dessas dicas, por favor, continue lendo: * preste aten√ß√£o nas bandeiras. Eles falam sobre as condi√ß√µes da √°gua e s√£o importantes. As correntes de retorno N√ÉO s√£o brincadeira. * A prote√ß√£o solar √© vital. Traga chap√©us, protetor solar e at√© mesmo uma sombra lhe faria bem. Reaplique conforme indicado na garrafa ou ap√≥s uma hora na √°gua. A reaplica√ß√£o salvar√° sua pele. A hidrata√ß√£o tornar√° sua ida √† praia muito mais agrad√°vel. Traga bastante √°gua. * Recolha seu lixo e qualquer um que voc√™ veja na √°gua. Por favor. Por favor. Por favor. Ajude-nos a cuidar de nossas belas √°guas e animais.  (Original) Great place for the family, but come prepared! It's a full day experience. This is NOT a quick beach trip spot. There is a very long boardwalk over beautiful water to get to the beach. There is no shade on this beach but the water is clear and gorgeous. Parents, here is what you'll want to know. * There are restrooms. * There is a shower near the end of the boardwalk but only one shower head works well so you may have to wait. The low foot one doesn't. * There is a gift shop but you can bypass and littles won't notice. They do have sunscreen but you'll want to bring your own waterproof sunscreen. It is a long distance from the beach. * The walk from the car to the beach will be a little less than a mile from start to chair. Bring a wagon for your gear/kids and triple check that you don't leave anything in the car because you won't want to go back. It's a beautiful walk though and it is part of the experience. *There is a playpark near the parking area. *Entrance fee is only 5 per car. Not bad at all.  *To all those who do not live near the water and may need these tips please read on: * pay attention to the flags. They tell you about the conditions of the water and they are important. Rip currents are NO joke. * Sun protection is vital. Bring hats, sunscreen, and even a shade would do you good. Reapply as directed on the bottle or after an hour in the water. Reapplication will save your skin. Hydration will make your visit to the beach much more pleasant. Bring plenty of water. * Pick up your garbage and any you see in the water. Please. Please. Please. Help us care for our beautiful waters and animals.
